description: Try our easy to follow Beef Tacos With Avocado And Feta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Taco,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Wheat free,Mince,Tomato,Avocado,Peanut free
name: Beef Tacos With Avocado And Feta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: Old El Paso Jumbo Taco Shells 10 pack

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook onion for 5 minutes, and then add beef and cook for a further 5 minutes, stirring to break up lumps. Add Taco Spice Mix and 1/2 cup of water, stir and simmer until thickened.
Mash avocado roughly with crumbled feta.
To make fresh salsa, combine cherry tomatoes, coriander and lime juice in a bowl.
For crunchy taco shells, follow pack instructions.
Serve crunchy tacos with lettuce, avocado and feta smash, beef, fresh salsa and mild taco sauce.
